stories.title: Run full-audit and capture baseline
stories.verification: npm run full-audit exits successfully, report saved

stories.title: Fix meta tag lengths (26 titles, 20 descriptions)
stories.verification: node scripts/fix-meta-lengths.js completes, grep finds 0 titles >70 chars

stories.title: Add FAQPage schema to Norwegian knee articles (~12 files)
stories.verification: grep 'FAQPage' plager/kne/*.html returns matches in all files with FAQ sections

stories.title: Add FAQPage schema to remaining condition articles (~100 files)
stories.verification: node scripts/add-faq-schema.js completes, check sample files

stories.title: Add MedicalWebPage schema to 74 pages without JSON-LD
Add mobile sticky CTA to 4 emergency pages
stories.verification: grep 'mobile-sticky-cta' returns matches in akutt-behandling.html, akutt-svimmelhet-helg.html, en/emergency-*.html

stories.title: Fix hreflang warnings (remove incomplete tags)
stories.verification: No hreflang warnings in audit - pages now show as single-language

stories.title: Fix heading hierarchy in top 50 most-visited pages
stories.verification: node scripts/fix-heading-hierarchy-v4.js completes on priority pages

stories.title: Run final full-audit and commit results
stories.verification: npm run full-audit shows 0 critical, 0 warnings
